thread.title: 25th Wedding Anniversary
thread.title_full: 25th Wedding Anniversary - Review of Hotel 41, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Agbami
title: 25th Wedding Anniversary
text:
I took my wife and Mother and Father in Law to this Hotel.
There is nothing I can say except this is the best hotel I have evert stated in. The staff were the most polite and graceful people I have ever met. Steve Jones and Michelle to name 2 could not do enough for us.
I cannot give more than 5 stars but I would say it needs 10 â›¤
Room Tip: I can only say I saw 2 rooms but I can only imagine they are all terrific See more room tips
